original_title: Jeffrey Dahmer: Confessions of a Serial Killer
overview: Jeffrey Dahmer lived a ghastly double life as an adult, ultimately becoming known as one of Americaâ€™s most infamous serial killers. Through an exclusive interview with Dahmer, as well as his mother and father, this program takes an extended look inside the mind of a serial killer.
title: Jeffrey Dahmer: Confessions of a Serial Killer
